body_html:
I think I may need your help with the errors showing up on grid_sample and affine_grid tests with cudnn.

Yes, I think the problem is that you need to add them to derivatives.yaml, because they were taking advantage of the nn autogeneration.
body_text:
I think I may need your help with the errors showing up on grid_sample and affine_grid tests with cudnn.

Yes, I think the problem is that you need to add them to derivatives.yaml, because they were taking advantage of the nn autogeneration.
body:
> I think I may need your help with the errors showing up on grid_sample and affine_grid tests with cudnn.

Yes, I think the problem is that you need to add them to `derivatives.yaml`, because they were taking advantage of the nn autogeneration.
